4 Coluna preenchida Gr√°fico exemplo - Coluna preenchida library(tidyverse) library(highcharter) highchart() %>% hc_add_series( data = dados_plot, type = "column", name = "Valor", pointPadding = 0.2, color = 'rgba(136, 145, 194, 1)', hcaes( x = as.character(ano), y = valor1 ), tooltip = list(pointFormat = '<span style="color:{series.color}">\u25CF</span>{series.name}: <b>{point.valor:.,2f}</b><br/> Valor1: <b>{point.valor1:.2f}%</b> ') ) %>% hc_add_series( data = dados_plot, type = "column", name = "Valor1", pointPadding = 0.4, color = 'rgba(0, 7, 45,.9)', hcaes( x = as.character(ano), y = valor ) ) %>% hc_xAxis(categories = as.character(dados_plot$ano)) %>% hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "Valor"), lineColor ="#f7f7f7", gridLineColor="#f4f4f4") %>% hc_plotOptions( column = list( grouping = FALSE, shadow = FALSE, borderWidth = 0 ), line = list(dataLabels = list(enabled = TRUE)) ) ano valor valor1 2017 120 100 2018 70 60 2019 58 58 2020 100 70
